title: (x) typeface used in Lexus ads - Nobel {Marc O}
content:
Sorry about that.

flake-o-matic...

\>\>\>

This is the typeface that Lexus has been using lately. I saw a TV ad that featured this typeface's book oblique and it looked GREAT. It was well spaced and very elegant.

Sorry that this sample attachment is kind of tiny.

Thanks everybody.

-will-

author: willdean

comments.content:
So tiny that I can't see it.  
Did you attach it?
Check out DTL Nobel or Neutraface (House Industries)
That's Nobel, not Neutraface. The G is a giveaway.

you guys are phenomenal.

i love you all.
lexus use nobel as a corporate typeface
